author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/qrdef (compensated affiliate link) - My Arcade and Atari have teamed up for an interesting handheld emulation console called the Gamestation Go with 200 games and the ability to add many more via its SD Card slot. See more retro gaming: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIswkmY7xCvaH3K_78rUsEIO and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:27 - Games & Interface
02:31 - Paddle control demo
03:26 - Save States, instructions etc
04:20 - Trackball with Centipede
06:20 - Number pad
06:40 - D-Pad, Buttons and Ports
07:47 - Battery life
08:29 - External Controller Ports
08:51 - Kickstand
09:16 - SD Card and Roms
09:43 - Emulating Other Paddle Games
10:35 - Genesis, SNES, Dreamcast and Playstation
12:50 - Atari Lynx off the SD Card
13:51 - Modern Atari "Recharged" Reboots
14:12 - HDMI Output
16:35 - Conclusion

title: Retro Gaming on the Go: My Arcade's Atari Gamestation Go Review
